quote: High school is about finding who you are, because that’s more important than trying to be someone else.
author: Nick Jonas

quote: You're off to great to great places. Today is your first day! Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way!
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child and one teacher can change the world.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and being.
author: Kevin Kruse

quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
author: Charles Swindoll

quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Christopher Columbus

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have.  Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: It’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
author: Abraham Lincoln
